title: SEO Specialist (On-Page, Off-Page, Technical SEO)
job_overview:
Perform keyword research and develop content strategies

Optimize websites for on-page SEO (meta tags, headings, content structure)

Conduct technical audits and implement SEO best practices

Build and manage backlink profiles through ethical outreach

Monitor rankings, traffic, and provide monthly reports with recommendations

Collaborate with content writers and developers as needed

Requirements:

Proven experience with SEO tools like Google Search Console, SEMrush, Ahrefs or similar

Strong understanding of on-page, off-page, and technical SEO

Ability to deliver measurable improvements in organic traffic and rankings

Familiarity with WordPress and basic HTML

Good communication and documentation skills

Bonus (not required):

Experience with local SEO and Google Business Profiles

Familiarity with content optimization tools like SurferSEO or Clearscope
